pkgmetadata.longdescription: Makes 'R' Easier for Everyone // A meta-package that aims to make 'R' easier for everyone, especially programmers who have a background in 'SAS' software. This set of packages brings many useful concepts to 'R', including data libraries, data dictionaries, formats and format catalogs, a data step, and a traceable log. The 'flagship' package is a reporting package that can output in text, rich text, 'PDF', 'HTML', and 'DOCX' file formats.
